alert.note: Alert for Richland; Vernon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 1:51PM CST until January 23 at 3:00AM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Snow Tonight, Bulk Of Accumulations This Evening... .A quick moving storm system will drop 2 to 5 inches across the area tonight, much of that falling this evening and holding south of Interstate 94. Snowfall rates of 1 inch per hour are possible with significantly reduced visibilities. Be ready for slippery winter travel through the night time hours. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow with 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...In Wisconsin, Vernon and Richland Counties. In Minnesota, Dodge, Olmsted and Houston Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 3 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, check 511ia.org in Iowa, 511mn.org in Minnesota, and 511wi.gov in Wisconsin.
